data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Sanliurfa, Turkey that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sanliurfa, Turkey
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Sanliurfa to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Sanliurfa, Turkey into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Sanliurfa, Turkey to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Father, 0.4% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Sanliurfa, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Sanliurfa, Turkey to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.section_summary:
the state of Sanliurfa, Turkey has a population of 1,802,000.

We estimate Sanliurfa has 676 people who might know Jesus, 10,088 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,791,236 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,665 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Sanliurfa, Turkey.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
